abstract: Former women's Olympic gymnastics coach Marvin Sharp dies of apparent suicide while being held on charges of child pornography and molestation in Indianapolis.
lead_paragraph: An Indianapolis gymnastics coach who trained two members of the 2008 United States women’s Olympic team was found dead of an apparent suicide in his jail cell.

headline.main: Coach Found Dead in Jail Cell
headline.print_headline: Coach Found Dead in Jail Cell
